import React from "react"; import { Container } from "react-bootstrap"; import styled from "styled-components"; import { FiPhoneCall } from "react-icons/fi"; const Styles = styled.div` background-color: #fff; .contact { padding: 20px 0; } .form-control, textarea { margin-bottom: 10px; } `; export const ContactForm = () => (
